#summary TimeFillets - simply manage time spend.
#labels Phase-Support

= Introduction =

TimeFillets is application, which purpose is to manage time spend when working on Task.


= Details =

Main purpose of TimeFillets application is to manage and associate time spend on Task in Project for Customer. It`s based on top of Google Calendar and uses a [http://code.google.com/apis/calendar Google Calendar API] to connect into it.

Users can mark time by inserting a special marking string into Google Calendar description. It associates this Event with specified Customer, Project and Task.

TimeFillets is a Windows application writen in C# (.NET framework).
